description:
for instances with separate kernel/ramdisk, kernel and ramdisk files are copied into dom0's file system into a folder named /boot/guest.

It cannot be assumed the folder always exists. For this reason we should create it before copying files in it if it does not exist.
title: xenapi: /boot/guest should be created if it does not exist
